statements: UPDATE product_sales_seasonality SET sale_price = 15.99, quantity_sold = 100 WHERE product_id = 1 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';

UPDATE product_sales_seasonality SET quantity_sold = 1000 WHERE product_id = 123 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE product_sales_seasonality SET sale_price = 50.00, product_name = 'Special Product' WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE ProductSales SET sales_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE InventoryStock SET stock_quantity = 1000, stock_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE product_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c9';

UPDATE ProductSales SET sale_quantity = 50, unit_price = 15.55 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE Inventory SET last_stocked_date = '2022-03-15', quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 54321;

UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100, last_stocked_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE inventory_id = 5678;
UPDATE product_sales SET quantity_sold = 50 WHERE product_id = 123
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity_in_stock = 1000, last_updated = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE product_id = 456
UPDATE product_sales SET quantity_sold = 100, sale_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity_in_stock = 500, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = 50, price = 10.55 WHERE sale_id = 456;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 10, stock_date = '2022-07-01' WHERE product_id = 2;
